backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing gallery and image management with CRUD operations for galleries and images, using blob storage mixin and Map data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components describing a bilingual coaching centre website with hero, courses, gallery, admission form, and contact sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for background, foreground, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Brilliant Coaching Centre website with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping all sections (Hero, About, Courses, Teachers, Gallery, Contact, etc.) with LanguageProvider and rendering floating UI elements like WhatsApp button and language toggle.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component displaying four feature cards (Concept Clarity, Personal Care, Discipline, Exam Preparation) with icons, bilingual content, and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/AdmissionForm.ts: Admission enquiry form component with validation that collects student details and sends formatted WhatsApp message to +91 98834 48350 with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying address, phone, and WhatsApp info in three cards with clickable actions and a map placeholder, all with bilingual support.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Displays a grid of three course offerings (LKG-IV, V-X, XI-XII) with icons, subjects, and descriptions, supporting bilingual content via LanguageContext.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Renders a fixed floating WhatsApp button that opens a chat with a pre-filled message in the user's selected language.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays footer with logo watermark, contact info, copyright notice, and attribution link to caffeine.ai, supporting bilingual text.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Shows a photo gallery grid with lightbox dialog for full-size viewing and navigation controls, supporting bilingual captions.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with animated background, logo, institute name, tagline, and WhatsApp CTA button for admission enquiries, supporting bilingual content.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Fixed button in top-right corner that toggles between English and Bengali languages using LanguageContext.
frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx: Displays three teacher profiles with avatars, classes taught, subjects, experience, and focus areas in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/TeachersNotes.ts: Tabbed interface showing teacher profiles and downloadable class notes organized by grade ranges (LKG-3, 4-10, 4-12) with bilingual support.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: React component displaying five key benefits of the coaching center (experienced teachers, small batches, regular tests, friendly environment, affordable fees) in a responsive grid with icons, bilingual support, and hover animations.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context provider for bilingual language switching (English/Bengali) with sessionStorage persistence and a translation helper function.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages Internet Computer backend actor creation with authentication support, using React Query for caching and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable auth client options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom dark theme using gold/yellow and maroon brand colors, OKLCH color space, custom animations (fade-in, scroll, gradient), and typography utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH-based color system (gold, maroon, dark backgrounds), container settings, custom animations, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a bilingual coaching center website with features including hero section, courses, teacher profiles, photo gallery, WhatsApp integration, and downloadable class notes with gold/maroon branding.
